profile.name: Name
profile.invitationsDescription: Here you can see stories that other users have invited you to contribute to.
profile.storyCount: Number of stories you've created or contributed to
profile.invitationNote: Note that an invitation is not a guarantee that you can contribute to the story.
profile.invitationLimit: There is a limited number of contributor spots for each story, and invitations may have been sent to multiple people.
profile.noStories: You haven't created or contributed to any stories yet. When you do, they'll appear here.
profile.myStoriesDescription: Here you can see stories that you have contributed to, including those you've created yourself!

home.findstory: Find a story to contribute to
home.startnew: Don't want to start a new story?
home.contribute: Explore open stories you can contribute to. Be sure to read through the story and its specific conditions before you begin!
home.terms: Don't forget to read our terms and conditions too.
home.spell: Spell & Tell is a storytelling game for you and your friends. It works just as well in school as it does in your free time.
home.create: Create fun and creative stories together. You start a story and choose which rules to apply, then pass it on to someone or leave it open for anyone to contribute.
